Description:
Who we are

At PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL), we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy. Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone, regardless of background or economic standing, has access to affordable, convenient, and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives. We’re a purpose-driven company, and our beliefs are the foundation of how we conduct business every day. We’re guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Collectively, these values inspire us to work together as One Team with our customers at the center of everything we do, and to take care of ourselves, each other, and the communities in which we live and work. We challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. Join us as we enable the hopes, dreams, and ambitions of millions of people around the world.

When applying for a job you are required to create an account, if you have... already created an account - click Sign In.

Creating an account will allow you to follow the progress of your applications. Our system does have some requirements that will help us process your application, below are some guidelines for creation of your account:
• Provide full legal First Name/Family Name – this is important for us to ensure our future hires have the right system set up.
• Please Capitalize first letter of your First and Last Name.
• Please avoid using fully capitalized text for your First and/or Last Name.
• NOTE: If your name is hyphenated or has multiple capitalization, please use the same format as your government ID.

Job Description Summary:
The PayPal Personalization AI team designs, builds, maintains, and improves the machine learning models and ML infrastructure that are used by various PayPal domains serving millions of users. As a Staff Data Scientist in our fast-moving, small entrepreneurial team, you will design and build performance metrics for the evaluation of ML models, and shape the business strategy for Personalization at PayPal. You will guide the product decisions on high visibility projects that benefit millions of users world wide.

Job Description:

Responsibilities:
• Design and build performance metrics for A/B testing recommendation models
• Use and promote data exploration techniques to discover new opportunities for personalization
• Influence stakeholders on product decisions by making compelling cases through data analysis and visualization
• Work closely with ML engineers and product managers to help understand performance impact of ML models on various domains and provide guidance on model improvement directions

Requirements:
• BS/MS in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics, or a related field
• 3+ years of full-time experience as Data Scientist or similar role
• Strong analytical and critical thinking skills
• Deep understanding of statistics, especially hypothesis testing and A/B testing
• Experience with relational databases and query authoring (SQL)
• Experience with programming languages such as Python, Java, etc.
• Experience with data visualization tools

Subsidiary:
PayPal

Travel Percent:
0

For more than 20 years, PayPal has remained at the forefront of the digital payment revolution. By leveraging technology to make financial services and commerce more convenient, affordable, and secure, our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 400 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying, or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.

PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.

As part of PayPal’s commitment to employees’ health and safety, we have established in-office Covid-19 protocols and requirements, based on expert guidance. Depending on location, this might include a Covid-19 vaccination requirement for any employee whose role requires them to work onsite. Employees may request reasonable accommodation based on a medical condition or religious belief that prevents them from being vaccinated

Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 375 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.
We are looking for a Data Scientist with a... positive attitude, an awesome team player, a customer champion, a rock star in preventing online fraud who has a data driven mindset that can help upscale our risk detection capabilities and provide innovative solutions based on automation, efficiency and accuracy in a high energy, fast paced, ever evolving environment.

Xoom, A PayPal Service, is revolutionizing the global digital money services market by providing people with an easy, convenient, and cost-effective means of sending money worldwide. We offer a secure, fast, and inexpensive means of sending money, paying bills and topping up prepaid services across multiple digital platforms to both online and offline recipients in over 160 countries and counting.

Responsibilities
• Works on multiple assignments simultaneously and in all areas of a standard project in the area of responsibility related to managing and mitigating Xoom financial loss caused by fraud risk (ACH returns, card chargeback and account take-over).
• Accountable for own results. Reviews are mainly for consultation and sharing ideas
• Focuses primarily on how to achieve overall analytic objectives of a project with speed and quality.
• Suggests ideas for operational and analytical plans and objectives?
• Clear subject matter expert who can help mentor and coach junior risk analysts or data scientist
• Works independently and proficiently on multiple assignments simultaneously with speed and quality
• Has working knowledge of internal and external business processes, and data, systems and flows, as well as analytic tools, processes, and methodologies to achieve the expected results with minimum supervision
• Has a good understanding of Risk business trends and directions to be able to put own work in the broad business context
• Identify glitches in processes and tools and develop and execute solutions to overcome general issues and obstacles with little supervision.
• Learning in-depth analysis of alternatives and applying specialized knowledge
• Impact of decision has moderate reach
• Seeks improvement within defined tasks. Understands, evaluates, and executes improvement ideas from supervisors.?
• Build risk related variables based on fraudulent trends and insights
• Partner with key stakeholders to design new risk platform to ensure better quality of risk strategies

Requirements
• Segmentation strategies based on statistical modeling
• Data analysis and visualization
• Machine learning
• PySpark, Python
• SQL
• Hadoop / Hive
• Unix
• Executive/Senior Manager presentation skills
• Story telling skills

Education
• Master’s degree, or foreign equivalent, in Statistics, Mathematics, or closely related quantitative discipline plus four (4) years of experience in the job offered or four (4) years of experience in the field of data analysis or statistical analysis
• OR Bachelor’s degree, or foreign equivalent, in Statistics, Mathematics or closely related quantitative discipline plus six (6) years of experience in the job offered or six (6) years of progressively responsible experience in the field of data analysis or statistical analysis

The Project Manager, or PM, will be responsible for leading a team of professionals in completing projects by a set deadline to uphold business initiatives. The duties include dividing up their budget for different project aspects and advocating for additional funding when necessary, selecting project team members from existing departments and setting or adjusting project schedules to adhere to deadlines.

Main Responsibilities:
• Planning and management of projects and projects inter-connected from different
• stakeholders.
• Delegating tasks on the project to team members best positioned to complete them.
• Ensuring timely delivery as per customer quality requirements.
• Project administrative and financial tasks (Timesheet assignment, creating/updating projects in AI project management system, issuing project order and project assignments, purchase orders, scope, quoting, forecast revenue, etc).
• Serving as a point of contact for teams when multiple units are assigned to the same... project to ensure team actions remain in synergy.
• Client communication (intercompany and external).

Qualifications and Skills:
• Thorough knowledge of project management under PMI methodology.
• Experience planning and leading projects - all project phases.
• Use of MS Project.
• Demonstrated analytical, consulting, negotiation, and problem-solving skills.
• Demonstrated experience producing and maintaining project documents and Processes.
• Knowledge of capital and operating budget planning, execution, and reporting.
• External Vendor Contracts, Procurement, and Contract Management.
• Enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and the ability to work in a multicultural global environment, with tight deadlines, multi-site teams, and different projects simultaneously.
• Advanced application experience (Excel, Word, e-mail, etc.)
• Desirable qualities: multitasking, proactive, solution-oriented, eye for detail, good with numbers.
• Experience dealing with customers.
• Competence in e-mail, report, and presentation preparation.
• Ability to work independently, evaluating workloads and schedules
• Excellent prioritization and time management skills

Knowledge:
• Agile Methodologies (Scrum/Kanban/Waterfall)
• English - B1 or above - Required
• Oral and written comprehension

Job Description Summary:
Xoom, A PayPal Service, is revolutionizing the global digital money services market by providing people with an easy, convenient, and cost-effective means of sending money worldwide. We offer a secure, fast, and inexpensive means of sending money, paying bills and topping up prepaid services across multiple digital platforms to both online and offline recipients in over 160 countries and counting.

We are looking for a Data Scientist with a positive attitude, an awesome team player, a customer champion, a rock star in preventing online fraud who has a data driven mindset that can help upscale our risk detection capabilities and provide innovative solutions based on automation, efficiency and accuracy in a high energy, fast paced, ever evolving environment.

Job Description:

Specific responsibilities include
• Works on multiple assignments simultaneously and in all areas of a standard project in the area of responsibility related to managing and mitigating Xoom financial loss caused by fraud risk (ACH returns, card chargeback and account take-over).
• Accountable for own results. Reviews are mainly for consultation and sharing ideas
• Focuses primarily on how to achieve overall analytic objectives of a project with speed and quality.
• Suggests ideas for operational and analytical plans and objectives
• Clear subject matter expert who can help mentor and coach junior risk analysts or data scientist
• Works independently and proficiently on multiple assignments simultaneously with speed and quality
• Has working knowledge of internal and external business processes, and data, systems and flows, as well as analytic tools, processes, and methodologies to achieve the expected results with minimum supervision
• Has a good understanding of Risk business trends and directions to be able to put own work in the broad business context
• Identify glitches in processes and tools and develop and execute solutions to overcome general issues and obstacles with little supervision.
• Learning in-depth analysis of alternatives and applying specialized knowledge
• Impact of decision has moderate reach
• Seeks improvement within defined tasks. Understands, evaluates, and executes improvement ideas from supervisors.
• Build risk related variables based on fraudulent trends and insights
• Partner with key stakeholders to design new risk platform to ensure better quality of risk strategies

Qualifications
• Master’s degree, or foreign equivalent, in Statistics, Mathematics, or closely related quantitative discipline plus two (2) years of experience in the job offered or two (2) years of experience in the field of data analysis or statistical analysis
• OR Bachelor’s degree, or foreign equivalent, in Statistics, Mathematics or closely related quantitative discipline plus three (3) years of experience in the job offered or three (3) years of progressively responsible experience in the field of data analysis or statistical analysis.

Special Skill Requirements:
• Segmentation strategies based on statistical modeling
• Data analysis and visualization
• Machine learning
• PySpark, Python
• SQL
• Hadoop / Hive
• Unix
• Executive/Senior Manager presentation skills
• Story telling skills

The Project Coordinator will support the project management, act as a backup when necessary, and manage administrative and operational elements of projects to assure successful completion and client satisfaction while meeting company financial goals for the project. Coordination of local and remote teams, subcontractor management, client communication and project planning are an integral part of the role of Project Coordinator.

Main Responsibilities:
• Planning and management of small projects and sub-projects in cooperation with PMs.
• Ensuring timely delivery as per customer quality requirements
• Client communication (intercompany and external)
• Project administrative and financial tasks (Timesheet assignment, creating/updating projects in AI project management system, issuing project order and project assignments, purchase orders, scope, quoting, forecast revenue, etc)
• Project Manager backup
• Vendor coordination

Qualifications and Skills:
• Demonstrate ability in project... coordination and project experience in testing, language technology, development, localization, or other relevant domain
• Enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and ability to work in a multicultural global environment, with tight deadlines, multi-site teams, and different projects simultaneously.
• High level of spoken and written English
• Excellent oral communication and writing skills (business correspondence), in tone and style for each situation.
• Experience with finances and admin tasks
• Advanced application experience (Excel, Word, e-mail, etc.)
• Desirable qualities: multitasking, proactive, solution-oriented, eye for detail, good with numbers
• Experience dealing with customers
• Competence in e-mail, report, and presentation preparation.
• Ability to work independently, evaluating workloads and schedules
• Excellent prioritization and time management skills

Knowledge:
• English - B1 or above - Required
• Oral and written comprehension

The Communications Specialist coordinates the internal communications that occur within the organization. Devices, designs, and edits communication for items such as memos, emails, fundraisers, contests, brochures, newsletters, and other internal publications. Writes, copyedits, proofreads, and revises communications content as necessary. Prepares strategic communication plans for the company. Ensures communication strategy is consistent and reflects the organization's strategic vision. He or she partners with the different directors, managers, key stakeholders, and contacts within other TELUS International departments to identify audiences and communication needs for their respective groups. The position also consults with stakeholders to determine the key messages, delivery methods, and frequencies for TELUS International Artificial Intelligence Data Solutions communication that supports overall strategic objectives, and at the same time, upholds the TELUS branding policies.

Main... Responsibilities:
• Support the internal communication strategy for TIAI
• Work supported by the creatives and communications team in TIAI to create and track internal communications campaigns and messages that inform our team members engaging them in our caring culture
• Support events and activities that end up in increasing the loyalty and reducing attrition of our team members in TIAI
• Support Human Resources in corporate events and activities.
• Support Human Resources to ensure team members are always informed and updated about the day-to-day of TIAI and the different geos in the world.
• Create and post content and moderate online communities for TIAI.
• Support the design, implementation, and execution of the company-wide communication strategy which needs to be aligned with the company’s vision and overall business strategy, while using and upholding the corporate branding policies that attract and engage potential team members, supporting the sourcing strategies for Talent Acquisition
• Consult with the Senior Leadership, the Communications Manager and the different program/department leaders to identify message types, audiences, and delivery methods most appropriate to their respective groups within and outside the company. Identifies, documents, and manages the communication requirements of the varied audiences within the organization (i.e., perform communication needs analysis with communication clients).
• Handle requests from the Global Marketing and Communications team from TELUS and TELUS International, reports to them any request from external media for information, supports Jeff’s agenda and events brief creations and requests approvals from such tams for any press release or communications being sent to the media

Qualifications and Skills:
• Being creative and open to challenging the status quo
• Strive for continuous improvement
• Demonstrate a passion and ability to help TELUS compete and win in the marketplace
• Strong collaboration skills. Open to sharing knowledge, creativity and experiences to build a strong working relationship
• Able to work in an ethical manner and support diversity
• Excellent oral, written, and listening skills
• Ability to recognize opportunities, make logical choices in a timely manner and take action with confidence
• Being a self-starter and proactively achieving identified goals
• Adaptability to change
• Customer service oriented, reporting abilities, excellent problem solving and decision-making skills, integrity and ethics, relationship and team building skills, tact, budget management and control skills

Knowledge:
• B2+ English level written and verbal.
• Oral and written comprehension.
• Appropriate use of language.
• Proficient in handling budget and reporting duties
• Excellent advisory skills and confidence in giving advice and information to senior managers
• An excellent understanding of the media and social platforms and trends
• The ability to think spontaneously and respond positively to pressure
• Self-confidence and the ability to ‘sell’ ideas

Studies & Experience:
• A bachelor's degree in Psychology or any Bachelor's in Arts
• 1 year as a communications specialist in the fields of advertising and/or corporate communications
• Proficient in copywriting (in English), media planning and modern digital platforms for advertising
• Excellent oral communication and writing skills (business correspondence), in tone and style for each situation.
• Advanced user for Microsoft Office / Google Apps

Job-Title: AI Data Solutions | Global Sourcing Manager
Description:
Description and Requirements Main Responsibilities:Effective interpersonal and communication skills. Personally engage with customers as a senior operational leader: understand customer business issues and lead global teams to execute on defined solutions across all service offerings.Accountable for increasing organic program revenue, managing margin, and other KPIs.

Work with operations leadership to ensure customer satisfaction and implement continual process improvement, measurement/benchmarking, and automation across all lines of service delivery.Track and monitor the performance of global delivery teams to achieve high levels of customer satisfaction, quality, and profitability.Qualifications and Skills:Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Language studies/ Management / Human Resources.

2-5 years experience in Sourcing/Recruitment managing roles.Global experience is a plus.Strong organizational skills and attention to detail are key requirements for this role.

Excellent... communication and teamwork skills – targets will be measured at both the individual and group level.Ability to adapt to a fast-paced work environment and work to tight deadlines and targets.Experience working in recruitment is a distinct advantage.

Excellent English skills and strong written communication skills.Social Media Channels knowledge and experience. Additional Job Description TELUS International is looking for a Global Community Sourcing Manager to join the Global Sourcing Team.

This is an exciting role that involves the Sourcing Administrator liaising with our candidate community on a daily basis. You will be working to achieve weekly/monthly sourcing targets
